content.detailedDescription: I was leaning against my car on the side road by the landing strip at cameron airpark tonight to see if any planes were coming and going. i then saw an object just below and to the left of the moon. at first, i thought it was just a star. but then it started to move in my direction (east) before abruptly stopping to just above and to the left of the moon. this occurred within the scope of about 15 seconds. it then began to move in a rectangular pattern followed by zigzags in which the object would make slow, precise turns not much different than what a computerized laser saw working off a design would make. about 10-15 minutes later, three lights appeared from what seemed like the 3 corners of a triangular object as well as a central white spotlight being emitted from a red source. it was then that i also was able to make out a shape of the fuselage. a dark, matte textured isosceles triangle. it was just above some low-lying clouds and i confirmed this by the reflection of these lights on the clouds. it appeared to be searching for something. the spotlight also did not go beyond the cloud which i will add is a bit odd since they were very low-density and not very high. i continued its patterns followed by sudden shifts from left to right and then i saw two small streaks of light underneath it before it simply vanished.
content.summary: Started out looking like a star to the left and below the moon, then it moved toward my location.  three other lights appeared and i could see a triangle and a spotlight coming from the bottom. it moved very mechanically.

content.detailedDescription:
Was resting on hood of vehicle looking up into sky while talking to two friends from school. sky was dark but crystal clear. observed 7 discs come from west sky at approx 9pm moving east very fast. they abruptly stopped directly above us. very high in clear star night. i immediately pointed them out to friends. one lay on hood of auto with me and observed them motionless when two moved rapidly to the north. and, one to the south leaving the others stationary. shortly the two returned to formation and approx 30seconds the other returned from the south to form the v formation again. this done they moved away at a great rate of speed,east, out of sight.Yellow/orange in color.Friends and i were amazed and couldn't believe sight.
we wee 15/16 at time of sighting. 3 people.
content.summary: Observed v formation,very high, of 6 discs.

content.detailedDescription:
The wyoming department of environmental quality has a web-cam in the thunder basin ntl. grasslands 32 miles north of gillete wyoming. i look at several web-cams at this web-site: http://www.Wyvisnet.Com/all.Html
i saw the still image and immediately thought the triangle was peculiar...I saved the image. i'm a little leary about sending it out due to possible copyright problems. i have contacted the webmaster of the site and asked if i need permission to send a still shot from the site to a third party. the site even includes an overlay of geographical landmarks (like ridges) and their proximity to the camera.
the next still shot captured by the camera did not show the triangle. i believe the shots are taken in five minute intervals. there is also a "history" of still shots and i saw no triangles in any of these previous pictures.
content.summary: Image of trianglur object caught on live web-cam

content.detailedDescription:
On main deck enjoying evening. oject appeared nearby starboard side. object immediately recognized as unidentifiable. size of object approximately 50 yards in length and 30 yards at widest point. oject was an elongated ovoid shape. luminescent orange. oject was intermittently semi-transparent. possible movement inside object. oject matched course/speed for approximately 90 minutes during which time radio communication and radar would not function. entire crew and compliment of 600 marines, in the neighborhood of 11,000 ships personnel witnessed the event.
the event was highly charged due to the duration. my reaction varied from near panic to non-apprehensive to calm curiosity. object seemed to literally fade out of existence.

if you require any further info i will be happy to supply it. i would like to know if anyone else has ever reported
this incident.
content.summary: Sighting aboard uss monrovia apa31 of large submerged luminescent object. general vicinity (azores) and timespan of uss scorpion sinking.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the middle of baja mexico driving to the states, and as sunset approached i notice a rocket shooting across the sky very fast with a huge amount of smoke coming out of it. i left a huge smoke line across the horizon and another smoke form of question mark were it took off about 100 miles away. first i thought was plane, then rocket, then missle.  two cars pulled over that driving in the opposite direction to watch it hover.  when  i looked back and saw it hovering i thought i was going to die or get abducted, i started driving faster in the other direction, it starting get dark and i lost sight of it but it was the most remarkable thing i ever saw.  it was a black cylinder shape object about 500 yds long and 100 yds wide and about 1000ft above the earth with 4 lights coming out of it and two were beaming at the earth. i have a small video of it.
content.summary: Saw a rocket go across horizon very fast with huge smoke behind it then it was 1/2 mile behind me.  two cars going the opposite way as i was driving from cabo, mex to the us pulled overed to watch it hover.  it was black in color and 4 lights beaming down

content.detailedDescription: Iwas outside wainting for jupiter to appear when i saw the object move across the top of a hill moving slowly toward the north east slowly. ihad asmall astromonical telescope and focused on the object. it appeared to be on fife from the inside like looking at the sun through a telescope. it moved about 3/4 of amile and stoped and wen't down behind the hill slowly.
content.summary: Round fire ball came over a hill about north west moving north east slowly

content.detailedDescription: The large circular object on the far left could be a mother ship. notice the bulge and possible opening on the bottom side of it. the other object is much smaller and white. there were several of the smaller type objects in the sky but not close enough to be in the picture. i took the photo from my front yard on sunday 7/2/06 about 12:45 in the afternoon. i enclosed a picture of the original and an enlargement of each of the other two objects.
content.summary: Possible mother ship and small ship

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from wall mart near a dirt road. it was like there was nothing ther at first then right above me just at eye level i saw the lights and then the craft itself .I wish i could give you a better description of the craft but for some reason i cant remember. i was completely speechless i almost cried becuase i was scared but at the same time i got to wittness what others have seen and i have dissmissed and, and it was so big.Like i said ther was nothing there then the light green lights then the craft itself . it just kinda stood there then disapered then reapered, and then a blure like when something moves realy fast on video camera.But right after i saw it maybe i minute later i saw a black helicopter fly over head wich was also very silent but not completely silent. this is no joke, its not my mind playing tricks on me and im not some freak looking for attention, if i had a camera this would be some of the coolest and best evidence on tape.This was real.This is the wierdest part, a day latter a man in all black with a black hat came and threatend me saying that realesing this information would only would result in death or abduction but when he said abduction i dont think he meant aliens. he was somewhat pale he kinda had chinese eyes and strange cheek bones thats all i can remember about his face if you guys know anything about what im telling you please email me.    thank you
content.summary: I almost cried ,triangle like shape light green light nothing corny like in the movies

content.detailedDescription: I was a prisoner at the u.S. correctional institution in oxford, wisconsin.  i was returning from the gym, approximately 8:55 p.M. - 9:00 p.M.  a group of prisoners were standing in the sidewalk looking up into the night sky.  i joined the prisoners.  i saw a ufo.  i started chanting "take me, take me, etc."  as there was a strictly enforced "5 minutes maximum" time to complete a movement between buildings, all the prisoners moved on after the ufo vanished in an unbelievably fast and quiet ascent into the night sky.  the ufo was directly overhead and it hovered, then moved erratically (though obviously by intelligent manipulation) up, down, sideways, etc.  the following evening's television "news report" advised viewers that those people who had telephoned and reported sighting an unidentified flying object had "actually seen a weather baloon over south dakota".  as i doubt that myself or anyone else could see across half the state of wisconsin and across all the state of minnesota to somewhere in south dakota, i felt that the television news station was insulting my intelligence.
content.summary: Light emanating from hoving craft, then extremely rapid vanishing to outer space distance

content.detailedDescription:
I am a 56 year-old business owner. i had spent over 20 years of my life as a cross-country truck driver and have witnessed many celestial anomalies. i know that atmospheric conditions can create some pretty unusual illusions, as can meteors entering our atmosphere. i've never had any interest in ufos and thought most people reporting sightings were pretty much crackpots. (sorry if that offends anyone.)the event i witnessed on saturday june 24th, 2006 has me completely baffled.
i was standing in the parking lot of my business chatting with an employee when i noticed something unusual float by overhead. at first, i thought it was a balloon that had escaped a child's grasp. i would have completely dismissed the object had i not realized it floated and traveled in the sky in a direction perpendicular to the wind direction.
when i brought my employee's attention to the object, he noticed something unusual in the sky to the north. hundreds of small cloud-like objects seemed to be materializing in the sky. these objects were traveling down from the heavens in an arc toward our position. three larger cloud-like objects appeared simultanously and traveled at a level altitude to a point directly overhead where they became stationary.
the smaller objects continued downward. as they came lower, the mist that shrouded them began to evaporate, revealing a shimmering egg-shaped object. they appeared a bit translucant and at this point seemed like a school of jellyfish approaching. when they reached a point over our heads, the outer "skin" had become clear and looked like a flexible membrane. the objects floated noiselessly passed us at two to three times treetop level at a rate of speed faster than the cars passing on the street--speed limit on the street is 45 mph.
as each object passed, we were able to notice more and more details. the first of which was a series of bright silver flashing lights inside the membrane at its bottom. in the interior of each membrane was a segmented globe-like object, much like a soccer ball. the sections of the globes seemed reflective, not of the sun but the sky around it. under the globe, wires or struts came out to a pointed horseshoe-shaped object, on which flashed the bright silver lights mentioned before. all the objects traveled at matching speed and flight patterns, much like a flock of birds. they reached their lowest point just overhead then curved skyward to a point where they seemlingly disappeared.
the event last from 10 to 15 minutes, and literally hundreds of objects passed by.
it is my opinion that these objects were mechanical in nature and constructed in such a way as to be unnoticed. in pondering the event, i've concluded that these objects desended from the colder upper atmoshere. when they reached a lower altitude, thay passed through a hot, moisture rich thermal layer, which created the mist around them--very similar to taking an ice cube out of the freezer on a hot, humid day. it was during this period of time during which the objects temperatures equalized with the air that they were visible.
my employee managed to take a snapshot of the event with his camera phone. in viewing the photo on the tiny phone screen, some of the objects are visible but very little detail can be seen on such a small screen. apparently, my employee does not have email capacity with his phone service, as he has been unable to email a copy to me. he states he can, however, send the photo to another picture phone. i am very interested in finding some one who can recieve this photo via phone message and return a copy to me via email so i may study the objects further. since this event happen, it has been driving me nuts as to what in creation these objects are. if you can offer any help in this regard, i would greatly appreciate hearing from you.
content.summary: Strange objects appear over dayton

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a few sky pictures in the field in front of my house this morning,7/3/06 about 9:30am and got this picture of a triangle among seven other anomalous pictures i took about the same time.
content.summary: Photo of triangle

content.detailedDescription: It was around 1:30 in the afternoon (american eastern time) in west long branch, nj (07764). i was at the bbq for the residents of the senior housing complex that i work at.  we had a dunk tank that the seniors could get a chance to dunk our maintenance supervisor in. i took many different shots of this with all the residents throwing baseballs at the trigger point. no one saw or heard anything abnormal at that point.  the next day i downloaded the pictures off of my camera and noticed that one of them had a black circle in the sky at a distance. i zoomed in and it wasn't anything my co-workers or i could explain. it appeared to be pretty high in the sky and not to far from us maybe within a 1/2 mile.  it looks like a black ball with a translucent black swirl around it.  i have no evidence that is, or isn't an alien ufo, as i do not have the eye for it.  please review the picture and let me know if there is any reasonable explanation, or other findings.  i do not recall seeing or hearing and planes or helicopters, it does not look like a bird, my lens was clean, and no one had thrown anything higher than the tank area. i will enclose the picture plus other action shots i took of the same setting within minutes of the shot for comparison. thank you!
content.summary: Didn't see it but caught it in a picture. it looks like a black circle moving in a circular motion.I have good camera that takes clear shots, so it must have been spinning fast.

content.detailedDescription:
Five or six saucerlike objects hovering over the channel
islands for about five hours. i noticed a very radiant
starlike object fixed over the ocean which drew me to the
shoreline. then i noticed the saucerlike objects over the 
channel islands.They all exibited green and red pulsating  lights. one saucer moved toward the shoreline where i was standing. it moved slowly and without noice. i thought
it might be a plane headed toward the oxnard aiport two
miles east of where i was standing. when it was near the shoreline it made a ninety degree angle and headed south
into the thick fog. the fixed radiant starlike object appeared in the same location in the night sky over the ocean for three or four more nights. then on the third or fourth night another identical radiant starlike object appeared along side the original one.My reaction to these
incidents was one of intrigue and i wanted to share this with others.My mother also noticed these events. what i also found interesting was while listening to the radio 
the following day after my initial viewing of the event,
there were numerous sightings being reported of ufos.I
honestly do not remember the exact date but i was within
the last six months.
approxiametly six to seven years ago while driving on the 
hollywood freeway headed toward san fernando valley at 4:00
am while the sky was still very dark i saw what appeared to be a long flourecent green cigar shaped object in the sky above me. about ten seconds after viewing the object it left the area at such a speed it seemed one second went
by and it was completely out if sight.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saucerlike objects and fixed radiant starlike figure

content.detailedDescription: I was at the north sideline of the bonita high school football stadium watching a high school football passing league tournament. i heard what sounded like a distant helicoptor huvering. i lookrd to the north and observed what appeared to be a cylinder shaped silver object just above a stadium light standard. i used one of the light fixtures to gage the size and approximate distance of the object, which was about the one tenth the size of the light fixture. i appeared to be approximately 3500 feet high and 2-3 miles north of my location. it remained stationary for a few minutes, during which time i took a picture of it, and brought it to the attention of other people that were there. there were hundreds of people there, but only 10 to 15 along with me and my 17 yr old son took notice. one lady took another picture with a digital camera, whice was much better than the cellphone picture i took. while the object remained there, it also appeared to change shape. it then, after approximately 10 minutes, began to move slowly to the northwest and upward. i watched it for another 30 mins until it disappeared into the sky.
content.summary: Observed object huverung over san gabriel mountains north of city of laverne

content.detailedDescription:
June 27, 2006 at 10:40 i was in my back yard smoking (facing south). i looked up at the sky and noticed a light to my(right) west. at first i thought it was just a flash of light in my eyes. i blinked a few times.
i followed the obeject as it moved from west to east for about 4 seconds.
the lights were dim but obvious. i would estimate that it was 4 to 5 miles high(based on the dimness of the lights).
the size of the object would be about the size of a pencil if held out at arms length.

there was no blinking of the light and the light ran the entire length of the object. 

the object was blurry.
my reaction was wtf???? as i watched it disapear into the glow of the city lights in the east.

i live between tinker afb and the oklahoma city airport and am used to seeing all types of aircraft going by, to include blimps and helicopters.
this was not a normal aircraft.
content.summary: Large craft moving west to east with solid lights (white) with red solid on top.

content.detailedDescription: I had just walked down to the bus stop near my house to go to work.  being an amateur astronomer for the past ten years it's a habit of mine to examine the skies especially when its clear which it was.  i noticed the object seventy degrees above the horizon lying in the north-north east and estimated it to be magnitude -1.  i immediatly realized this to be odd because no particularly bright star should lie it that area.  to get my bearings i found venus and the star deneb, finding both i recognized there should be no -1 mag. star where i was seeing one.  after staring at the object for about a minute and rubbing my eyes to make sure nothing wierd was happening with my vision.  i glaced down the street at the sound of my bus approaching, when i went to take one last glance at the object i noticed it had disappeared.  when i got home after work i checked with my computer planetarium program and the amateur association of variable star observers website to check for any alerts.  neither method of research corrosponded to what i had seen.
content.summary: Stellar appearance, sudden dissapearence, corrospondes to no current star maps

content.detailedDescription: My parents had just returned from a meeting with my lecturers, and told me that they saw two (2) lights over the low mountain-chain against which our house was situated on the way home. we went outside, and the two unknowns were seen hovering, one on top of the other, in a north-westernly direction. they proceeded to slowly move away, over the mountain. we collected our binoculars, and telescope, and proceeded to follow them for approximately one (1) hour, during which time we contacted via cellular phone the johannesburg international airport requesting information on aircraft in the area of krugersdorp, a small suburb of johannesburg, over which the objects were travelling. the reply was that no radar contacts were in that area. during this time the lights merged into one. before this event, visual contact was made and the objects' shapes were determined to be disc-shaped. we also contacted the police station in said suburb, and were told that an ovoid object had been sighted very close to the police station, which promptly disappeared, corresponding with our own sighting of the light abruptly fading out.The object/s were in visual sight during most of the 1h15min duration, excepting the drive up the side of the mountain-chain. the entire incident was slightly unsettling, and i stil get nervous talking about it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Unknown lights - jhb

content.detailedDescription: Five of our grandchildren were fishing in our pond about 3:00 p.M.  when they saw a big splash on one side of the pond everything became still the pond became like glass the object sank then they saw a whilpool in the pond about 8 to 10 feet across it went very fast across the pond towards them and when it hit the water there was steam that went up from the object then the object disappeared to reappear in another area , one of the children got on a boat that was at the bank and she could see lights around the sides and the object looked like metal two other children said they saw the lights but two of them said it looked yellow under the water , three of the children ran into the house but were unable to discuss what they had seen then the other two were still watching it when they saw the water next to them start to move and the grass around the pond near where they were standing started moving violently so they got scared and ran to the  house.It took them about three hours before they would tell us what had happened and what they saw they were very disturbed but each one said the same story and they range from 7 years old to 13 years old. the next day we drove around the pond to see where they had seen the splash, not knowing what we would find and we were amazed to find tracks  like truck tracks that led to the pond but before it got to the  pond the tracks stop and there was a circle where the grass had been  laid down then it must have been air borne but the grass at the edge of the pond  had been bent down where it must have passed as it splashed in the  pond. the strange thing about the tracks was that the grass laid down the wrong way from the way grass normally falls down  we followed the tracks until we came to where they ended and there was grass laid down in an arc shape. this happened in our hay field that hadn't been hayed yet. the children had no idea what they had seen but they were very upset. also they said there was a cloud over them that was swirling the older children thought it might be a tornado also they said that the cloud had a sound like a muffled lawn mower they thought at first it was thunder but then they forgot about everything when they saw this object go into the pond.When i became concerned that the water in the pond might be contaminated i called the osu extension agency and took a sample of the pond water to the man in charge and when he asked me  what i was concerned about i related the story and he said he knew exactly what i was talking about , there had been two other families that had seen the same thing our children had seen and it had scared them so bad they wouldn't talk about it . please let me know if you are familiar with this sort of ufo because i want to know if they are dangerous and if the water is contaminated because of some kind of fumes it might let off.
content.summary: Landed in our pond in the afternoon tuesday june 27

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from charlottesville on i64 towards waynesboro va (3/26/05 or 3/27/05) on my way home from work around 5:30pm est. when i started my incline towards afton mountain i saw the contrail of a very high speed jet(presumably military-seemed too fast for a civilian jet) over to the left. i watched it for a few seconds out my window & when i looked in the direction it was headed (right above afton mountain)i saw a disc about the size of a dime in the top (driver's side) corner of my windshield. i watched it all the way up the mountain (about 5 minutes) & it didn't move. the sun was setting on the other side of the mountain and the sunlight was glistening off the bottom of the disc like it was water. it didn't seem to move much, but seemed to be wobbling slightly. once i was atop the mountain and headed around the turns the jet contrail (jet was too high to see, could only see the contrail) was right upon the disc & it disappeared. i was in disbelief & thought to myself that i'd been watching too much tv. i was skeptical before the sighting, thinking that ufo's were a possibility, but this made me a believer.
content.summary: I saw a disc over afton mountain on my way home from work, right around sunset. the sun glistened off the bottom like it was water.

content.detailedDescription: Arrived home the bus was on schedule.Landlords brother-inlaw asked what is that up in the sky? looked north-west at 11:00am..Thought object was first a bird then a balloon. it was very slow moving.Then noticed it was rotating. changing from small sphere to football shape. noticed dome or knob on top and something like a rod sticking out of the dome.Ran into the house to get my binoculars and lost  sight of it. neighbur said it went in the clouds. this was at 8:41pm. this really caught my interest. blimps hover but i dont think they rotate,hot air balloons might but there was no basket.
content.summary: Slowly rotated from sphere to football shape with a knob on top.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving in my car heading west on ventura blvd in sherman oaks. the object was directly ahead, low on the horizon, right around sunset time, sky was still bright. the object was shooting upwards very fast, leaving a large yellowish/orange streak (colored b/c of the sunset i believe)in its trail, the object was a glow and light a fireball so it was very unusual to see so i kept my eyes on it, very obviously in awe of what i was seeing. i immediately wondered if other people were noticing, but i didn't want to take my eyes of of the event, and i was driving so i couldn't communicate with anyone else around me in other cars. shortly, the object burned out, and i thought that was the full event, but then kept looking at the sky and noticed another object was still traveling where the other had burned out, this time not as bright, but still leaving a trail (less obvious behind it) i turned onto a smaller street and noticed two people on foot pointing towards the object also, so i pulled over and they asked me if i thought it was a plane and i said no. this object got bigger and brighter and was glowing an orange and appeared quite close to us in the sky, as i kept watching, it all of a sudden burst out what looked like a cloud of rain, sort of like fireworks made of cloud. then the object grew less bright, but continued moving away from us on the horizon. eventually disappearing over the horizon behind some clouds in a southward direction. 
i was in awe and rushed home to see if anyone else that i knew had witnessed it, leaving the other witnesses i had bumped into behind.
content.summary: Bright light/object shooting upwards disappears, other object takes place

content.detailedDescription: I was in my front yard washing my car, talking to a friend of the phone.  i noticed a trail of vapor, like the kind a jet leaves behind.  i followed the trail with my eyes, and saw where the trail ended.  about 1/8 of a mile ahead of the end of the trail was a bright light with several smaller lights circling around it.  i told the friend on the phone to go outside, and look outside - he lives about 5 miles away.  as soon as he saw it, the object looked like it exploded - there was a huge cone/trail/tail of light behind it, the object was still moving fast.  the tail disappeared after 10 seconds or so.  there was no sound, or flashing lights, or trail, or evidence of the burst of light.  the object picked up speed, and several more smaller lights came out of it, and started revolving around it.  we counted six in total.  by this time, my friends wife was outside with him watching.  the object zigzagged sharply several times, picked up more speed, and disappeared over the mountains.
content.summary: Bright, round object w/ vapor trail, tail, explosion, erratic/zigzag movement, super fast speed

content.detailedDescription:
June 27, 2006 anthony was sitting on a blanket outside with binoculars in hand.  he saw some white flashes and then a stationary "star" moved erratically and zigzagged. a round bright object moved slowly across the sky, then shot upward, flashed, and disappeared.  

previously anthony saw 6 air force jets, and afterward 6 more 2-engine jets.  it was unusual for jets to fly in this area.
content.summary: Round bright object moving erratically

content.detailedDescription:
June 27, 2006 anthony was sitting on a blanket outside with binoculars in hand.  he saw some white flashes and then a stationary "star" moved erratically and zigzagged. a round bright object moved slowly across the sky, then shot upward, flashed, and disappeared.  

previously anthony saw 6 air force jets, and afterward 6 more 2-engine jets.  it was unusual for jets to fly in this area.
content.summary: Round, bright object.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard smoking.  i saw what looked like an airplane or helicopter at first, moving in a fairly straight line at normal aircraft speed seeming to appear from the horizon(the tree-line). i couldn't tell if it was going towards me or moving up.  then the object stopped moving or slowed down.  it then stayed in the same general area of the sky, but intermittenly it would move in various directions at various speeds, sometimes seeming to do circles or arcs.  it slowly drifted north as i watched it go behind clouds and then come back out from behind them, still doing it's 'dance'. it then seemed to go back down or away from me.  i watched until it went below the tree-line again. it had variable brightness and speed. it seemed to flash from at least two different parts of it. at it's brightest it was brighter than all of the stars in the sky at that time, but not nearly as bright as venus is when venus is visible.  the object was 2 to 5 times as big as an average star.  it's movement was too erratic to be an airplane. it changed directions in ways that i have never seen anything do in the sky, except for a balloon in the wind.  however, the fact that it was obviously beyond the clouds, meant that it's movements were probably too fast to be a balloon or blimp.  i tried to film it but the batteries in my camcorder were all dead.

van johnson
content.summary: Flashing red blue and green.

content.detailedDescription: I was just taking sunset pictures in my front yard. i never saw the object until i downloaded it to my computer and pulled it up. ive taken many sunset pics from this position and have never seen anything like this.  in the bottom right corner is my finger. personally, i can see the finger in the foreground and the ufo in the background. i also took other pics along with this one with my finger in the shot and another with the strap, there were no " ufo,s " or similar effects in any of those photographs.  i also checked the lens and there was no dust or foreign objects. needless to say i was thrilled to see this possible ufo !, and i can also say that this object was in no way was created by myself in any way other than pushing the shutter button. :o) kal
content.summary: Ufo caught on film

content.detailedDescription:
1) driving (as passenger) north west on conifer road to 84th ave, then west on 84th ave.

2) daughter noticed "light in the sky, saying it was a comet", i explained it was a jet, then noticed these other things a bit further east and heading south   west toward then more directly western.

3) i remarked that it was a helicopter carrying a vehicle, then noticed a passenger jet apparently pass below the objects.

4) while observing the objects, they appeared to break up and regroup, ie, each group of objects (there were two), seemed to split into different objects, approxiametly five seperate shapes, then clump back together into one group, but remaining as two distinct flying objects one following the other. this distance between each during the break up formation was just bigger than a hairline from the distance observed, about half the size of each individual shape.

5) continued observing the objects as we drove and then parked at huron plaza on 84th. i noticed that the objects seemed to have a halo around them, where the sky nearest to the object was brigher, and the halo was a darker color of sky with normal sky outside that area. it was faint and perhaps a trick of the setting sun, but i mentioned it as soon as i observed it.  a good way to illustrate the halo would be to touch a finger to an lcd flat screen monitor set on a sky image, the distortion of color is somewhat the same.
my family went into the buffet, i headed to the grocery store, while keeping sight of the objects, which had been moving west while we were driving, but now had apparently increased altitude (becoming smaller), and then stopped dead in the air. the second object remained behind the first, now at a greater distance eastward than originally observed. it took about five minutes to cross the parking lot and finish a cigarette, and they did not move at all. i attempted to photograph the objects but they  were so small at this point i had enough trouble just finding them with my eye, therefore was only aim in the general direction of them with the 1 inch digital viewfinder. if i did capture the objects, i can't tell the difference from the objects and jpeg artifacts once i've zoomed into the image enough to find them.

6) entered the savealot at huron plaza for some groceries, when i exited i could not relocate them, what i did spot was a split second flash in the sky, not like lightning but more a point of light that elongated in both directions in a split second and was gone. there were no other vehicles in the sky as i scanned to relocate the previous objects and cross the parking lot to the buffet.

i've attached a "sketch" of my best recollection of the activities i observed, the upper portion of the image is a very general impression of the motion, and the black diamond is my best guess as to the actual shape of the objects when they were not grouped. it was the ungrouping that really stood out and shocked me, if they had remained in formation i would have assumed birds or  jets, but they clumped back together into a single object (each of two) . i should also note that there were no lights on these objects, nor color reflections from the sun, they remained black at all times.
content.summary: Pair of high altitude objects, one following the other, seemed to separate and regroup

content.detailedDescription: When i took this picture i was real close to my house so the object is higher in the sky than it might seem from the picture. i made sure that the gutter on the eve of the house was visible in two of the pictures for orientation sake. there is the original and two enlargements.
content.summary: Bright light over house in daytime

content.detailedDescription: Me and my mom and dad were sitting in the yard star gazeing and saw what we thought was a shooting star coming straightdown towards the mountain and it made a right angle turn at the top of the mountin and coutinued for a few seconds before dissapearing this happend two more times in about a hour being six years old at the time i really didnt know what i had seen but my dad was in the army and couldnt explane what we had witnessed my mother is still alive and some times we talk about that night
content.summary: Very similar too metor

content.detailedDescription: Keep in mind this event occured in an approximate time zone as i cant remember the exact yr now that it happened.  while racoon hunting one night in november a few years or so after i got married,in the 80's, my hunting dogs came back to me which was very unusal as they just don't do that.  i noticed a low object about 1,000 feet above the trees or so, coming towards me over the field.  it made no noise and it had  3 large white lights in a triangle shape.  i could tell how big it was because it blocked out the stars.  i thot it might have been a b-2 bomber but it made no noise, none! i squated down with my dogs, who were freaked out, and sat quietly and observed it. it continued flying very slow over this field then it left the area. later while sharing my experience, i talked to another person who had been traveling that night on hwy. 71 in our area, who informed me that there were several cars stopped and pulled over who also viewed this same object that i viewed.
content.summary: A huge large triangle while hunting.
